title: What is it like to have your graduate admissions acceptance rescinded? - Quora

response.answer_text: I truly hope that you are asking this out of curiosity, or that you made a bet, rather than actually considering some kind of caper! If you lied or provided false information, if you forged documents of any sort like transcripts, DoD documents like a DD214, if you did not report previous attendance at a college, hid a criminal record, are using forged i.d. ….. your admission WILL be rescinded.
I imagine this would be extremely devastating. This highlights how important it is to be transparent and thorough when completing graduate school applications.
